results.name: This Dungeon Only Gets Worse As You Go Further

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: G4560 Dual Core Processor or AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 650ti 2GB or AMD RX 550 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 9400F or AMD Ryzen 3 3300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 8GB or AMD RX 6600 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
